mapper.select: select qrCode, type, spec, cell_id, station_id, supplier, manufacturer, factoryNumber, purpose, buyDate, person, organization, ip, comBaudrate, comDataseat, comBegin, comEnd, checkMode, sysParam, readerSpeed, timeInterval, distance, readerType, frequency, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, id from production_mes2.bas_cardreader where id = #{id}

select bp.*,ws.stationName,bw.cellName from production_mes2.bas_cardreader bp, production_mes2.bas_workstationinfos ws, production_mes2.bas_workcell bw where bp.del_flag='0' and bp.station_id = ws.id and bp.cell_id = bw.id limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into production_mes2.bas_cardreader(id, qrCode, type, spec, cell_id, station_id, supplier, manufacturer, factoryNumber, purpose, buyDate, person, organization, ip, comBaudrate, comDataseat, comBegin, comEnd, checkMode, sysParam, readerSpeed, timeInterval, distance, readerType, frequency, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values (#{id}, #{qrcode}, #{type}, #{spec}, #{cellId}, #{stationId}, #{supplier}, #{manufacturer}, #{factorynumber}, #{purpose}, #{buydate}, #{person}, #{organization}, #{ip}, #{combaudrate}, #{comdataseat}, #{combegin}, #{comend}, #{checkmode}, #{sysparam}, #{readerspeed}, #{timeinterval}, #{distance}, #{readertype}, #{frequency}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update production_mes2.bas_cardreader
qrCode = #{qrcode},
type = #{type},
spec = #{spec},
cell_id = #{cellId},
station_id = #{stationId},
supplier = #{supplier},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
factoryNumber = #{factorynumber},
purpose = #{purpose},
buyDate = #{buydate},
person = #{person},
organization = #{organization},
ip = #{ip},
comBaudrate = #{combaudrate},
comDataseat = #{comdataseat},
comBegin = #{combegin},
comEnd = #{comend},
checkMode = #{checkmode},
sysParam = #{sysparam},
readerSpeed = #{readerspeed},
timeInterval = #{timeinterval},
distance = #{distance},
readerType = #{readertype},
frequency = #{frequency},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
